lines.name: Wheelies
lines.text: *SCREECH*

lines.name: Wheelies
lines.text: Stop right there Power Traingers!! We won't let you take the last train!

lines.name: Trainger Blue
lines.text: Curses! We don't have the time to deal with these Wheelies...

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: Trainger Red, go on without us!

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: If anyone should take the last train, it should be you!

lines.name: Trainger Red
lines.text: No! If we're getting that train, we'll be getting on together!

lines.name: Trainger Red
lines.text: TRAINGER KICK!!!
*EXPLOSIONS*

lines.name: Wheelies
lines.text: AHHHH!! *SCREECH*
HAHAHA. But you're too late Power Traingers!

lines.name: Trainger Red
lines.text: W-what?! Who's that on the train!

lines.name: Trainger Black
lines.text: They call me... TRAINGER BLACK.

lines.name: Trainger Black
lines.text: And this... is your last stop!

lines.name: Trainger Black
lines.text: TRAINGER BEAM!!

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: Trainger Red, look out!
*MORE EXPLOSIONS*

lines.name: Trainger Red
lines.text: Trainger Yellow? Why did you shield me?!

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: Urgh... D-don't worry, I'll be fine...

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: I keep my promises remember? I won't end here so easily...

lines.name: Trainger Yellow
lines.text: My resting station will come when all three of us... can finally take a train to visit... the... sea...

lines.name: Trainger Red
lines.text: TRAINGER YELLOW!!!!!!!!

lines.name: Announcer
lines.text: Aaaand this concludes our live performance Power Traingers: Fight Against the Train Wreck!

lines.name: Announcer
lines.text: Please check out the sequel in threatres, coming out early next month!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: TRAINGER YELLOW!!!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: TRAINGER YELLOW!!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Are you serious?! You're just going to end the live performance with a cliffhanger like that?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What about the kids!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How can we go on not knowing whether or not Trainger Yellow will make it!!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I admit, Power Traingers has some terrible marketing practices, but the stories still get me.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Are you going to be okay?! Trainger Yellow was your favorite character wasn't he?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well, I already knew since they showed spoilers in the commercials and magazines.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But you can expect more rants from me on Ribbitter tonight.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ohh gotcha.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, that was fun! It's time for me to go back to work.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Back to work? I thought you took the day off today.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well I did, but my office has been getting kind of messy lately.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I figured today's as good a day as any to clean it up.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And then, I can make fun of Keyna's messy office afterwards.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Alright, I'll leave you to that.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Maybe I'll stop by my client's place then.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: They're finally making progress again after the advice you gave last time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Nah, I was just throwing spaghetti at the wall.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You're the one who actually made sense of the suggestions I made.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But cool! I'll see you around then Tai!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: ...See you around.
